column4: They did not prepare breakfast that they wrote they would do something in their mail.

column3: The location near to the beach, shoos and restaurants.

column4: At arrival welcome is quite cold.

column3: Big room with a large terrace overlooking the main square of Le Zoute and the sea. Centrally located. Great bar on the rooftop. Breakfast, within the current COVID-19 restrictions, was well organized and OK. We tried both restaurants, the Bistrot and the Seafood Restaurant. Both excellent. Not really cheap but hey, this is Le Zoute! Staff very friendly and helpful.
Great Breakfast and the location is fantastic. Best Skybar ever. Nice view and good beds. xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
It was good despite Covid. Construction work on the front side but all was ok
column4: N/a it was overall ok for a night and good value (covid time)
